docs.snippet: BILLS REPORTED To facilitate the formation of agricultural societies Favorably. To amend the act authorizing the creation of town insurance companies, and taxing foreign insurance companies doing business in the state.
docs.lead_paragraph: BILLS REPORTED To facilitate the formation of agricultural societies Favorably. To amend the act authorizing the creation of town insurance companies, and taxing foreign insurance companies doing business in the state.

docs.snippet: If suffering long be in any sense an equivalent for long-suffering, that Christian grace must be fairly predicated of the people of this City.
docs.lead_paragraph: If suffering long be in any sense an equivalent for long-suffering, that Christian grace must be fairly predicated of the people of this City.

docs.snippet: Our diplomatic service is not precisely the strongest point of our public organization. The Legations of the United States in foreign parts are commonly, and not unjustly, regarded less as the outposts of the active political army than as the Chelsea...
docs.lead_paragraph: Our diplomatic service is not precisely the strongest point of our public organization. The Legations of the United States in foreign parts are commonly, and not unjustly, regarded less as the outposts of the active political army than as the Chelsea Hospital or Hotel des Invalides of public men.

docs.snippet: The Rev. HENRY WARD BEECHER lectured on Thursday night in the Cooper Institute, before a large and admiring assemblage of the members and friends of the Young Men's Christian Association of this City. The subject he selected for his address was "The...

headline.main: The Rev. Henry Ward Beecher on "The Burdens of Society."

docs.lead_paragraph: The Rev. HENRY WARD BEECHER lectured on Thursday night in the Cooper Institute, before a large and admiring assemblage of the members and friends of the Young Men's Christian Association of this City. The subject he selected for his address was "The Burdens of Society." In its treatment, he displayed many of those quaint felicities which form the principal attraction of his style.

docs.snippet: ARRIVAL OF THE ONLY SURVIVOR AT BOSTON. The bark Azor, Capt. BURKE, from Fayal, arrived at Boston on Tuesday, bringing 45 "Consul's men,' or shipwrecked seamen, who had been collected at that island, Among these is the alleged only survivor of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: ARRIVAL OF THE ONLY SURVIVOR AT BOSTON. The bark Azor, Capt. BURKE, from Fayal, arrived at Boston on Tuesday, bringing 45 "Consul's men,' or shipwrecked seamen, who had been collected at that island, Among these is the alleged only survivor of the ship Margaret Tyson, of New-York--"WILLIAM KENNEDY."

headline.main: AFFAIRS AT ALBANY.; Mr. Christie's Quarantine Bill-Its Provisions and Intentions-State Prison Laws-A new License Bill-The Publiuc Printing Contract-To head off Ancient Lobby Agents-Closing the Theaters against unprotected Children-Intercasting Projects and Proposals.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. CHRISTIE, of Richmond County, tills morning introduced into the Assembly his Quarantine bill. As its provisions are exceedingly important to all your citizens, to Staten Island, Long Island, NewJersey, and the whole mercantile community, I have prepared an abstract of its several sections:
